snippet: The authorities in London said Friday that seven members of the Royal Marines had been arrested on suspicion of murder after “an engagement with an insurgent” in Afghanistan last year.
lead_paragraph: The authorities in London said Friday that seven members of the Royal Marines had been arrested on suspicion of murder after “an engagement with an insurgent” in Afghanistan last year.

headline.main: Britain: 7 Royal Marines Arrested Over 2011 Death in Afghanistan
